commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basd8f61af"

diff:
"d8f61af Bug 390845 - integrate Talos with new pageloader.  Bustage fix for sending data in chunks to graph server, variable initialized in wrong location. r=anodelman p=anodelman
diff --git a/testing/performance/talos/run_tests.py b/testing/performance/talos/run_tests.py
index a380ab1..0b60977 100755
--- a/testing/performance/talos/run_tests.py
+++ b/testing/performance/talos/run_tests.py
@@ -192,10 +192,10 @@ def send_to_graph(title, date, browser_config, results):
         val_list = cd[count_type]
         chunks = chunk_list(val_list)
         chunk_link = ''
+        i = 0
         for chunk in chunks:
           filename = tempfile.mktemp()
           tmpf = open(filename, "w")
-          i = 0
           for val in chunk:
               tmpf.write(result_format2 % (float(val), res + "_" + count_type.replace("%", "Percent"), tbox, i, date, browser_config['branch'], browser_config['buildid'], "discrete"))
               i += 1
"
